Title: Implement `sili create` (core)
Description: Create a named Podman container inside the Lima VM. Pull image if missing. Mount project dir to /work. Record container_id in state.json.
Label: runtime

Title: UID/GID user mapping in container
Description: Inside container, create a user matching host UID/GID and exec as that user by default. Prevent permission issues on mounted files.
Label: runtime

Title: Implement `sili enter`
Description: Interactive shell into a running container using podman exec via limactl shell. Default cwd=/work.
Label: cli

Title: Implement `sili run`
Description: Run non-interactive commands inside container. Capture exit code and forward stdout/stderr.
Label: cli

Title: Implement `sili ls`
Description: List all known environments from state.json with status (running/stopped/image).
Label: cli

Title: Implement `sili stop <env>`
Description: Stop a running container without deleting it. Update env status in state.
Label: runtime

Title: Implement `sili rm <env>`
Description: Remove container and associated volumes. Clean state.json entries safely.
Label: runtime

Title: Persist env metadata in state store
Description: Store image, container_id, mounts, volumes, ports, status, last_active per env.
Label: state

Title: Basic error handling + recovery
Description: Detect missing containers or desynced state. Provide actionable error messages.
Label: infra
